content.detailedDescription:
I have filled out this form before and reported my first ufo encounter a while ago. the first time i was extremely afraid.
my second time was very different and didn't scare me at all. it did leave me questioning my sanity back then however.So i didn't tell anybody about it until i was about 35.


i was often going to castle nideggen at night with a friend.We usually just walked around the castle, went on one of the towers to the west and watched the view while talking about mostly meaningless personal things.
we didn't have contact for a while and didn't go to the castle for about 1-2 years and then he visited me and we had nothing better to do and decided to go to the castle again.

when we arrived there it was about 21:40 and already dark outside.
(my friends name is thomas küntzler and he lives in drove too)
i don't recall exactly where we went first in the castle. its possible that we first walked up to the top of the south-west tower (which is the only one intact) and then we walked to the remains of the south-east tower.
(there is a metal gate now and its locked now for whatever reason.)

on the tower (its not very high) we started talking like usual. i was facing my friend and looking to the west. i could see the ruhr river valley from my position and had a good view in the direction of the town of brück and schmidt.

while my friend was talking to me suddenly the clouds lit up in one spot and something came out of it very fast like a shooting star. it looked just like a shooting star but it was closer and brighter. in the first moment i thought it would come down somewhere south of schmidt but then it flew into the ruhr valley which was only 1-2 kilometers away approx..
i was somewhat excited to see that and expected the shooting star to hit the ground where i can see it down in the ruhr valley.
but when it hit the ground(or the tree tops...Not sure) it seemed to bounce off without loosing speed and it came flying exactly in my direction and vanished about 15-20 meters away from me into nothing.
it was a large ball of light about 10 meters (probably larger) in size.

that all happened so quickly that i wasn't really able to react to it at all until the object was already gone. my friend thomas had his back turned towards the ruhr valley (he was facing me) and didn't even notice it. he just noticed that i was looking at him confused and wasnt paying attetion to what he was saying suddenly.
back then i did not tell him(or anybody else) what i witnessed because usually nobody believes you and people later think your some kind of crazy person who wants to get attention.
content.summary: Ufo bounced off the ground from the ruhr river valley close to castle nideggen

content.detailedDescription: On july 31st, 2016, while camping near raft pond with my boyfriend (quenton, 36) and my son (noah, 10), both me and quenton were heading to the tent, at shortly after 11:30pm.  noah had gone to bed a couple hours prior, so me and quenton stayed up to have a couple beers and chat around the campfire.  when we decided to go to bed, quenton threw a bucket of water over the fire, and while we were both waiting for the smoke to clear, we started admiring the view of the stars from where we were.  no light pollution meant we could see more stars than where we lived, and both being lovers of the night sky, just stood there staring for a while.  i saw what i thought at first was a chinese flying lantern, and pointed it out to quenton.  he immediately said to me "that's not a lantern, its moving too fast"  so we both stood there and watched it for a few minutes.  it went up and then to the right, very quickly.  then stopped and went left in an almost straight line before shooting down almost to the horizon, and then zig zagging its way back up to almost right above us.  this went on for about 15 minutes.  i tried to get a video of it with my phone, but it was too dark and too far away.  my heart began to beat faster and my breathing got heavier, as i wasn't sure what to say or do about the experience.  we noticed as it was flying around that all the animals went silent, and we couldnt even hear the river flowing that was less than ten feet from our campsite.  as i said before, we watched it for about 15 minutes before it shot off into the distance out of sight.  neither of us could sleep that night, we just stayed awake until dawn talking about it.
content.summary: Saw it in the pitch black while camping with my boyfriend.  we both witnessed it.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my home's roof top.

2. i had hear the sound.

3. ufo, because i know's how ufo looks.

4. flying like bee.

5. i had exited

6. after 1 hour.
content.summary: I had see the red blinking lights with the sound of ufo

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my cat outside on leash to eat the grass out front my house. 10 minutes later i'm watching the stars when a plane heading west catches my attention and as i watch it fly by just past the plane something catches my eye. at first i thought it was just another satellite going by and did think much of it until i notice two more lights following the first. as i watch the three lights heading east i start to make out a dark shape or edge that looks curiously like a triangle. i went to take my phone out to record it but my camera isn't good at night and i didn't wanna take me eyes off it so i stop. still watching it suddenly it changes direction at 90 degree angle and is now heading north till it goes out of view behind a hill/tree. at this point i become overwhelmed with emotion, remembering my cat i quickly rush her inside to get back out to try and understand what iv just seen. now from the time i see the plane to the time i watch the lights go out of view all happens in maybe 10-15 seconds. after coming back outside a few seconds later i kept my eyes on the same area of dark cloudless sky. i'm watching the sky when a small flock of birds flys south, if it wasn't for the full moon i wouldn't have seen them. at this point that reassures me that the first thing i saw was not birds but just raises more questions about what it was. i keep my eyes up, maybe 3-8 minutes later somethings else catches my eye. as i try to focus on it i realize it has three lights as well, triangular shape, and very similar to the first one i saw. it could even be the same one but i can't say for sure. this object with lights is heading west towards the mountains, i'm able to follow it with my eyes for a few seconds till it goes out of view into the darkness of the sky, almost like it vanished. at this point i'm overwhelmed with emotions and excitement most of which is hard to explain but i don't take my eyes off the sky for another 10 minutes. slowly i'm coming to terms with what i think i saw, iv been watching the sky for years with no luck, but tonight i feel like i won the lottery.
content.summary: 3 lights with triangle outline, was heading east, changed north, we out of view, few minutes saw another heading west.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been seeing the same two objects in the sky for months. in different areas of the eastern sky. flashing blue, red, 
white lights. they can move they fade sometimes when aircraft comes close. i have observed them moving back and forth quickly. tonight one was almost directly above my house. ( first time was this close) it scared me to be honest.
don't take my word for it.. ride along cherokee county, al.County road 18.
look to the eastern sky you can jude for yourself.  but please if you can find out what i'm seeing. let me know  i'm scared.
content.summary: Two crafts with red blue white lights here every night for months. in different places in sky. ur welcome to come see.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the school, outside at night, writing when i first noticed a plane moving very slowly to the west of me, it turned quickly and headd north. i downloaded a flight app to see what type of plane it was. there was no information. it could not be found. i figured it was just a plane then less than 2 minutes later a plane (not definitively the one i saw earlier) flew from the north and was heading south when it abruptly, too fast and too sharp for a normal plane, turned and headed west. directly above me. i panicked and grabbed my things. i would have taken a picture but i was more worried about calling someone. i was trying to dial my boyfriend while rushing to the car, and while trying to keep an eye on the "plane." i decided at that moment that this was no ordinary plane. it looked like a small plane but made no noise and turned and manuvered too well to be a small plane. i looked up at it above me and even though there was nearly no clouds in the sky, only to the west and they were very high and wispy, there was a mist surrounding the plane. i could see the lights easily but could only make out the grey ish color, just barely. as it flew over me and did nothing i finally ran as hard as i could to my car. i stopped looking for it and was just focusing on calling my boyfriend and getting home. which is luckily in the opposite direction the object was heading.

i know it sounds like a plane, but there was something just "off" about it. i'm still shaking and frightened. my anxiety is skyrocketed.
content.summary: It looked like a plane but did not move like a plane.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:15pm on 9/13/16, while walking my dog, i observed a bright light in the ne sky, above the city of suwanee, ga. we have big, clear skies, here, and i'm always watching. i always try to ascertain what i'm seeing, as i live within 40 miles of the atlanta airport, and see passenger jets, small planes, and helicopters regularly. 

this light changed colors, randomly. the light changed colors- white, red, green, blue, violet. there was no pattern to the change of colors. i watched this light for 5-7 minutes, before said light 'blipped' out. 

this is the first unexplained light that i've ever seen. i'm 46 yrs old, excellent vision, and was not under the influence.

the photo attached, is poor in quality, but i figure something is better than nothing, i feel...
content.summary: Observed stationary light in ne sky

content.detailedDescription: Estava fumando na garagem de casa quando avistei esse objeto, na direçao oeste para leste. movimento em linha reta e depois subil em 90 graus e ficou ivisivel. tirei 2 fotos.
content.summary: Ufo avistado a noite brilhante iluminado

content.detailedDescription: *1- standing on our porch smoking. *2-my wife pointed the lights out to my father and i. *3- i immediately recognized these lights from seeing them once about five years ago. they are like nothing else i've ever seen in the sky and i look in the sky allot. *4- we saw 4 horizontal, yellowish-orange lights turn off in sequence from left to right. then we saw them turn right back on in sequence from right to left,stayed on for about five seconds and turned off in sequence from left to right again. *5- i immediate felt like it was not of this planet. i saw these exact lights about five years ago in salvo nc about 30 miles north of buxton.  the only thing different was the lights were random five years ago. my wife called my sleeping mother out to see them but they were gone by the time she got to the porch. my wife and i looked around for twenty minutes hoping to see them again,unsuccessfully. about 8 minutes after the sighting we saw a red light (like a planes light) coming from the western sky heading straight to where the object disappeared. we heard the plane flying even though it appeared to be really high in the sky (sounded like a jet fighter). *6-when the lights turned off the second time we never saw them again.
content.summary: My wife my father and i were standing on the porch we saw 4 yellow orange lights appear shut off one at a time then reappear one at a time and disappear one at a time

content.detailedDescription:
Took a selfie in bathroom mirror. apon closer observation of photo noticed entities in window. i'm three stories up. 

submitted two photos. the original, look at window. then window blown up.
content.summary: Took selfie...On third floor apon closer observation of photo noticed "entities" outside window

content.detailedDescription: Stood on my upstairs balcony to have a smoke. saw two brite  orange lights coming from east directly towards me about half a mile apart single file  formation towards my direction moving slow and then watched them both turn left going south over the escarpment picking up speed and high altitude and then both brite orange orb shape craft fizzle out to nothing.. i purposely looked at both crafts to see that it "did not have" the standard red and green lights on either side of the craft to determine natural direction that all planes and helicopters must have on vehicle. i watch these skys every night and this definitely does not share the characteristic traits of daily plane helicopter satellite xcetera flies in the sky that i know of..
content.summary: Watched 2 objects come towards my direction both in single file formation half mile apart then turn south both then climbed high  then fizzled  out  light gone.

content.detailedDescription: I walked out onto a deck facing east to look at the nearly full moon over the ocean on 28th street in sea isle city, nj. i saw a large bright red light approximately 30 degrees above the horizon that caught my attention. at first i thought it was a plane, but then it disappeared, and re-appeared several times (while keeping it's general course north) but the light was dramatically changing locations while moving north. it then started bleeding or trailing into its appearances, and then it vanished. my feeling was pretty much "jaw-dropped." the whole ordeal lasted maybe 15-seconds.
content.summary: Saw lights appear/disappear in different locations over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I am overseeing a construction project for a friend and was looking up to see what progress was being made on the outside walls. at that time i noticed something white in the backdrop of bright blue sky, i pondered over it for a few seconds ruling out that it couldn’t be cloud or airplane or helicopter. i worked in the aircraft industry for over 40 years so i am well aware of what human made flying machines look like and how they behave in flight. a weather balloon maybe! but just as i was thinking that the object moved, not at a startling pace and not that far but it was able to get from point “a” to point “b” quickly. for the period of time it was visible some of the time it was stationary but when it moved it had 360 degree movement without having to bank to change direction, losing altitude as if falling like a stone, gaining altitude straight up like a rocket. there were four others on the construction site watching it with me along with others working on a house across the street, others walked and drove by but i don’t know how many of them might have seen it. it was brought up later that it could have been a drone, but i don’t think so. if it had been someone’s personal drone it would have had to be close and i’m sure i could have been able to better identify shape and probably hear something. a military drone in this rural area in panama, why? i don’t know of drones with the range of movement of what i witnessed. although it is difficult to assess distance when you don’t know size, the area where the object was hovering and maneuvering around is an inactive volcano called vulcan baru. other than that there is nothing in the area other than farmland and mountains.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Static orb in blue sky followed by directional and altitude changes.

content.detailedDescription:
On 9/14/16, my wife and i were driving home from the store. it was approximately 1915-1920 in the evening. the sun had set, and there was a light pink hue to the horizon, as well as a dark, thin cloud that stretched across our view. as we rounded a curve on cr 115, i noticed a light a bit above the cloud cover, orb shaped with a sharp outline. i slowed the truck down and mentioned it to my wife. its color was dark orange, it was hovering in place, noticeably larger than a star, pulsated quickly, than slowly brightened. it blinked out, abruptly and sharply. at the exact same time, it reappeared a foot (to my prospective, so many miles in reality, as it was a great distance from our position) to my left. it appeared to be on a same plane position (as if it were on an invisible straight line0, hovered for a couple of seconds, pulsated quickly again, and then sharply blinked out again. we saw nothing more of the object. 

i am a marine corps ssgt, iraq and afghanistan veteran. i have seen, and supported operations of numerous military aircraft, manned and non... there is no technology that i have ever seen, or am aware of, that could perform the maneuver i witnessed.

it was undoubtedly intelligently controlled, and was performing a purpose. these were not flares. i have witnessed more flares, and numerous types of flares. this did not behave as a flare, look like a flare, nor is there any reason that a flare would be deployed in this area.
content.summary: Large, bright light, deep orange color. small distance above low cloud cover. hovered, pulsated and brightened. blinked out consisely and sharply, while simulaneously appearing miles away.

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared coming towards us and at at first i thought it was a drone. not it was a hovering triangle and i have footage sndbwithesses.
content.summary: I have video.

content.detailedDescription:
I am unsure of the year this happened in. it may have been 1987 or 88. i believe it was in the fall. 

i had given a coworker a ride home after work, and was on my way back to san jose to my own home. it was 1 am or a little after and there was very little traffic. something out my window caught my eye and when i looked out i could see a very large flat bottomed craft moving very very slowly coming from the east. i'm not good with judging distances, but i guess it was only a few hundred feet up. 

it seemed to be flat black, not shiny, and there were a few red lights. some blinked, some were steady. looking ahead, i could see 4 or 5 cars pulled off to the side of the road and i pulled in behind them. i noticed that everyone was a single driver (no passengers) and everyone was in the exact same position; drivers door open, right foot on the door step, left foot on the ground, right hand on the top of the open door, head tilted up to see the craft. i pulled in behind the last car in the line, and one of the last things i remember about the sighting is laughing to myself that i was also in the same position as the others. 

my memory about some parts is fuzzy, but i think i recall that there were small bubble windows and that i could see the outlines of 2 humanoid shapes in each bubble, with a red light in the bubble behind them. it was moving very slowly, and had a curved edge. i think it was round. i couldn't see the entire craft, it was just too big, but it blocked out the sky completely. all stars were gone, even in the horizon. it was silent. i think i watched it for 5 minutes, and it moved so slowly i still never saw the end of it. 

the next thing i knew, i was in the driveway of my home, turning off the engine. my husband met me at the door and he was furious with me. i was excited and trying to tell him what i'd just seen but i couldn't get a word in. this was not like him at all, so i shut up and listened to what he was saying. he was angry that i was home so late. i tried to remind him that i had taken home a coworker, he said something about the time and i looked at the clock. it was close to 430am. i should have been home by 130. i had no idea. 

the next day i searched the papers and tv news for stories, knowing that i hadn't been the only witness, but heard and saw nothing at all. i remember telling my sister all about it, and my high level of excitement, and i remember telling her "i'll never forget this for as long as i live". but i did forget, until about 2 years ago. my memories are sketchy and i feel like i'm probably forgetting things. 

i've had ufo sightings since i was about 5 years old. i also have memories of speaking to 3 beings hovering over my bed, and saw other things too. but this one had other witnesses, so i always hoped i'd hear about it from one of the others on the roadside, but never have.
content.summary: Very large, dull black, could only see the bottom, windows, silent

content.detailedDescription: While parked and sitting in the car in a parking lit in fremont, ca with my dog at approximately 11:00 pm on 9/11/2016, i was speaking on the phone to a friend.  we were discussing the strange happenings lately in my environment.  on this particular evening i was witnessing very peculiar light displays which appeared to emanate from the street and parking lot lamps.  i kept hearing noises around my vehicle.  i looked out of my driver's side view murror and noticed strange movements and more sounds. i then began recording into the mirror and captured what appears to be a very small being peeking arpund the corner of my car. initially i didnt notice the being.  only upon watxhing the video the next day did i see the entity.  i was absolutely floored and shocked at its appearance from behind my car.  the being has a large head for its body and seems to be only about a foot tall.  the being has large dark eyes and you can briefly see the hand of the entity as it peeks around the corner.
content.summary: No ufo witnessed.  alien entity was witnessed.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of the 13th i was watching the meteor shower in the sky with my dad, when a bright purple(similarly colored to the northern lights) object shot up into the sky. it appeared to be very gassy and also seamed to start right at the tree line. we saw about 4-5 of these bursts shoot up in about 45 min, starting at 4:10. me and my dad first thought it was a plasma burst (caused by a solar storm) but was latter ruled out because looking them up they did not seam to be what we saw. we tried to photograph it, and get video of it. but had no success... during this night there was also a meteor shower. and what appeared to be lightning in the sky (there were no bolts but the clouds kept lighting up). it was an amazing sight, but unfortunately i have no idea what it was or what caused it.
content.summary: Brightly colored gassy object

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon headquarters, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, while on the phone with witness. september 14th, 2016
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

all in milwaukee wisconsin

my first sighting in 1959. 
i was walking home at night down an alley and saw a volkswagen size red orb coming down the alley. it was 30' from me and 12 feet off the ground.It seemed to stop and i looked at it and it looked at me. it then went down the alley to the dead end and shot straight up in the air. this was on 18th street and it dead ended on 19th street. i suffered no ill effects from this encounter, and no lost time.

my second sighting in 1962
this was near 15th street and brown street. i was married with two babies and got up in the night to use the bathroom, it was about 3 am. while going past the window i saw a fleet of flying saucers. they were about 5 miles away and flying over houses. there must have been twenty of them flying in formation. they were traveling east toward lake michigan. funny thing is after i saw them i just went back to bed.

my third sighting in 2014
i was driving to the store about noon, going south on 76th street. this street is a very busy main street. it was a bright day with few clouds.
i saw a flickering, glittering object in the sky. it was a silvery disk.It was just hovering. it was one to two miles away. i kept my eye on it in traffic and it just hovered. i finally lost sight of it, but then a large military jet came very low over the traffic headed where i had first seen the saucer hovering.
content.summary: I was walking home at night down an alley and saw a volkswagen size red orb coming down the alley

content.detailedDescription: I video taped, using my samsung note 4 phone at full zoom, launch from my home approximately 50 miles from launch site at 1810 hours on 8 sep 2016. i did not notice object until i viewed the video. at first i thought it was a booster coming off rocket, but it is clearly well above the rocket when first appears so cant be a booster falling. when viewing video the object appears above rocket traveling from north to south until object is out of frame of video. i emailed some still shots to a nasa rep who told me he didn't kmow what object is either.
content.summary: Object above rocket during launch 8 sep 2016

content.detailedDescription:
A strange light caught my attention while walking south on broadway in manhattan friday september 2nd around 12:30pm in the vicinity of the flatiron building. 

the light was moving westerly to southwest and appeared to be translucent and dully reflective at the same time. it is because of how the light appeared that i took note and began to watch it move slowly across the sky. a few minutes passed and i decided to record the light with cell phone video,for a total of 57 seconds. towards the end i lost sight and attempted to move back into view, but i had lost it. i did not see where or how it disappeared. 

later that evening, i reviewed the recording and saw multiple orbs which flew in various paths in various directions at various speeds around or near this initial object. 

around 10 seconds into the video a fast moving orb enters the screen from the left (east), travels towards the initial light (west) and then abruptly changes direction back towards the east. 

about 15 seconds into the video another orb is seen traveling from the bottom of the screen in a straight path towards the top of the screen. it is slower than the previous one. 

after many personal viewings, i have identified many more recorded light movements and flashes of light throughout. i'm unsure which of these could be digital noise and i lack the software to do anything more than pause. 

i am extremely interested in an analyst's findings and summary of the recording.
content.summary: Single observed "strange" light in sky caught my attention, the recording revealed orbs of various paths.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11:30 p.M. and i was standing on my back deck letting my dog out and my dog started acting weird. i live in the country so i assumed he saw a deer or something but then i saw a strange light in the sky shooting towards the ground and the object in the sky made a straight path. i had a perfect view of it all the way i could see it.
content.summary: I was letting my dog out behind my house and saw a strange beam shooting towards the ground and saw a weird thing in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
While working in the office, i saw a huge symmetric object in the sky.
looks like a cloud but was so symmetric and stable that its just can't be a cloud.
content.summary: Huge shape in the sky.  very symmetric

content.detailedDescription: I was out hunting squirrels at hazlet state park outside of grafton illinois on 9/13/16 at around 5:45ish 6. i was hunting in a bluff elevated area when i noticed some of the wildlife in the area acting odd such as bird flocks moving very quickly in the sky like a eagle or other predator was chasing them and they were moving in a rapid flock change,and even a few deer moving quickly in a panicked run along with a strange absence of squirrels and other small wildlife i usually see when i am out hunting i also noticed that my cell phone had a total loss of service although i usually do not get good reception in the area but i do get some service as i have hunted this area in the past with some service i did notice however that my compass on my paracord bracelet was going odd directions instead of true north although this is not a professional compass i have never had it act this way before. after i moved from the spot i noticed this from i came near a bluff over look when i noticed something in the sky that i first thought to be a helicopter in the sky but upon further look i found it to be a large triangle object in the sky that was motionless. there was no noise coming from this object like a helicopter would have and no motion from this and it was a silvery gray and black object with no visible windows i did zoom in with my scope on my rifle but it is not a very powerful scope but i did see some small bright lights on its underside that did blink a few times during this i didnt feel unsafe just really freaked out and confused. after about 10 minutes it began moving silently away from the area towards alton but i lost track of it as it was moving fairly quickly and i could not follow it because of tree line. after i left the area and went back to my car my phone had service again and my compass was acting normal but i did have someone mention seeing something in the sky when i went to get gas in grafton. after i saw this i told a coworker who told me to contact this place.
content.summary: Was hunting squirrels in forest and saw a triangle like ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Óáçã ãä çò çیñçä.Ãä یå یæ ýæ ïیïã ˜å åñ ôè çøñçý îçäیãçä ãیçیï èç ãä çñêèçø ïæóêçäå çی èñþñçñ ˜ñïå çò ãä �یòåçیی ãیîçåï

I was on my back patio looking up at the sky. 

it was dark and did not notice the object until almost directly overhead since it did not have lights or propulsion sound. 

it was hard to tell the elevation of the object but i could hear the wind over the wings and the street lights seemed to light the bottom of the wing slightly.  

it was boomerang shaped. 

v shaped grey or light color.  only sound was the wind over the wing no lights or engine sound. high clouds at the time but the object was low enough to hear the wind over the wing. 

i have never seen anything like this in years of watching the sky since a kid.  

i was sitting in a lawn chair and once the object passed over and out of sight, i got up and walked in the yard to see if i could see it between the houses across the street to the south. 

object flew to the south out of observation behind the houses across the street.
content.summary: V shaped grey only sound was the wind over the wing no lights or engine sound. high whisper clouds at the time but low enough to hear it go over.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting out on our deck around 11pm on august 27, 2016.  we noticed a group of orange, glowing orbs from the northeast about 10 feet above the house across the street.  they floated slowly and silently towards our direction. 

we noticed them because we were seated facing north, so you couldn't miss them unless you were asleep.   we both observed these object with a skeptics eye at first, but it was unlike anything we had ever seen before.  they made absolutely no noise.  there was no frame to them (like a chinese lantern).  we saw them from the side and from directly underneath. 

i rushed into the house, grabbed my camera and told my daughter to come see these objects. i exited our deck into the front yard and started filming.  

there was 5 of them.  they were hovering just above the power lines.  the objects were in a line, one behind the other.   as they reached our house they moved into a circular formation. they hovered above our house for about 20-30 seconds before going back into a linear formation and moving on towards the southwest.   

my wife then noticed that a sixth orb was hovering just 5 or so feet above our house as if it was curious of us.  that's when my dog started to bark at the object.  it hovered over us for about 10 seconds before joining the other 5 orbs.  

as they all floated away in the distance, they seemed to just disappeared. there was no wind.  there was no noise.  they were always at least 15-40 feet away from us until they finally floated off and disappeared in the distance.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 orange orbs float silently over our house through our neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: I was sat in my hot tub in my back garden and at 8.15pm i heard fighter jets nearby, fifteen minutes later some lights appeared, they could swallow each other up and then spit them out. they atayed for about 45 minutes from 8.30-9.15pm
content.summary: Bright lights moving in sky at speed with fighter jets heard before the sighting

content.detailedDescription:
On the roof of my house, nothing just walking.

just felt something moving in the sky at distance but then i focus.

alien controlled ship 

it was travelling a little tilted but going in a straight line.

when i saw it, i focus then i freaked out. my heart started racing too.

i dont know it just vanished i guess after some distance
content.summary: It was huge , cant be human built i must say. have 3 big jet like engines glowing on the back like a flame

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the truck n thru the sun roof i noticed 3 orb like onjects that changed into pyramid structure go over my head the sound was loud and obnoxious my mother heard the sound from inside the house i was outside in the driveway as it flew over my head i couldnt decide what was going on weather to think it was a plane that was flying to low n was near crash then thought back a couple seconds to when i first seen the object in a group of 3 orbs from a distance they started to move in a postion like if they conjoined to one thas when it flew over n was going torwds the moon decented n vanished past the trees still able to hear this object for about another minute in a half after it was out of sight i was absolutely amazed as it happened my mouth dropped and i started to panic because i was alone it was late n i thought for sure as low as they were once there lights got bright i was gona be in the object but no it flew over me as i sat in freeze i do believe there is there some kind of intelligent life other than earth more advanced than earth we are not the center of the universe there is about 10 million + more universes other than our own i believe in all that but to actualy see something i feel like i wasn't supposed to see it's like a kid on christmas eve sneaking into his parents room finding the presents what i saw i will never forget i feel like everything happens for a reason and i was meant to see what i saw
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
